repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: According to the manuscript colophon the text is from the Brahmāṇḍapurāṇa. The Brahmāṇḍapurāṇa edition published by Venkatesvara Steam Press does not include this text. The same manuscript is available in the Wish collection, the digitized manuscripts from this collection are available on the internet archive. This is a part of Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland.

msItem.title: Śriraṅgamāhātmyam

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 22 p. 276, vol. 36 p 112 Wish collection identifier- raswhish49-50.

msItem.incipit: devadevavirupākṣaā śrutaṃ sarvaṃ mayādhunā trailokyāntargataṃ vṛttaṃ tvatmukhāṃbhojanissṛtaṃ |
msItem.explicit:
śṛṇvan paṭhan likhan bibhran
gamāhāmyamuttamaṃ muktvā śubhāśubhe yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ ||
msItem.colophon: śrīraṃganāthārpaṇamastu śrīraṃgamāhātmyaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ | ௳ hariḥ om śubhamastu ௳ gurubhyo namaḥ ௳

support.p: Only at the beginning there is a guard leaf. Brown thick leaf used as guard.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: Very good but the letters are faint.

handNote.desc:
The letters are faint hence the shape of the syllables are not very visible. At the end on
folio, some part of the folio is damaged due to the ink spread.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin of the first folio.
Title śriraṅgamāhātmyam is written in the left margin.
121 is written in pink pencil and 34 is written in blue pencil on the guard folio. And at the end 121 is written in blue and number 34 number seems to be erased.

encodingDesc.p: Question mark used to show illegible letter.

TEI.text:
devadevavirupākṣaā śrutaṃ sarvaṃ mayādhunā trailokyāntargataṃ vṛttaṃ tvatmukhāṃbhojanissṛtaṃ | tathā puṇyāni tirthāni puṇyātvāyatanā
ni ca | gaṃgādyāssaritāssarvā itihāsāśca śaṃkara | kāveryāstvat prasaṃgīnāṃ tasyāstire tvāyā purā
bhate rājyaṃ vaiśvasya dhanasaṃpadaḥ | śudro vi (pi) bhagavat bhaktiṃ yojano vijayo sudhī | garbhīṇi janayet putraṃ kanyāṃ vindati satpatiṃ śṛṇvan paṭhan likhan bibhran
gamāhāmyamuttamaṃ muktvā śubhāśubhe yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ || iti śribrahmāṇḍapurāṇe māheśvaranāradasaṃvāde śrīraṅgamāmye
daśamodhyayaḥ śrīṇaṅganāthārpaṇamastu śrīraṅgamāhātmyaṃ saṃpurṇaṃ hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu gurubhyo namaḥ
